bug.short_desc: Devise new layout that supports iconified embedded windows

long_desc.thetext: Currently, an embedded window that supports the "iconify" symbol and method, simply disappears, and cannot be retrieved anymore. A new layout for these cases should be devised that supports docking of iconfied windows, e.g. at the bottom of the parent window.
Increased prio for this useful addition. but untargeted it as it is unlikely to make it into 1.0.
